title: Acceptance of Terms
content: By accessing or using this application, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions.

title: Use of Application
content: The application is intended for creating, managing, and reviewing job descriptions. You agree to use it only for lawful purposes.

title: Data Privacy
content: We respect your privacy. Any data you provide will be handled in accordance with our privacy policy.

title: Changes to Terms
content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the application constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.
